Browse the source code of netbsd/external/bsd/ipf/dist/lib/icmptypename.c

1/* $NetBSD: icmptypename.c,v 1.2 2012/07/22 14:27:36 darrenr Exp $ */
2
3/*
4 * Copyright (C) 2012 by Darren Reed.
5 *
6 * See the IPFILTER.LICENCE file for details on licencing.
7 *
8 * Id: icmptypename.c,v 1.1.1.2 2012/07/22 13:44:38 darrenr Exp $
9 */
10#include "ipf.h"
11
12char *icmptypename(family, type)
13 int family, type;
14{
15 icmptype_t *i;
16
17 if ((type < 0) || (type > 255))
18 return NULL;
19
20 for (i = icmptypelist; i->it_name != NULL; i++) {
21 if ((family == AF_INET) && (i->it_v4 == type))
22 return i->it_name;
23#ifdef USE_INET6
24 if ((family == AF_INET6) && (i->it_v6 == type))
25 return i->it_name;
26#endif
27 }
28
29 return NULL;
30}
31
